SamPy.resolve.misc.findSlitsDirectImage

This Page

  • Show Source

Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

SamPy.resolve.misc.findslitsÂ¶

Fits slit image to a direct image to find x and y positions.

Currently the script uses a slit image. In the future however we probably want to use the spectrum itself because there is no guarantee that a slit confirmation image has always been taken.

todo:try to do the minimalization with scipy.optmize or

some other technique which might be faster and/or more robust.

requires:PyFITS
requires:NumPy
requires:matplotlib
requires:SciPy
author:Sami-Matias Niemi
